allow: Bash(cmd /c "mkdir d:\\deliverzler\\configs 2>nul & echo Created configs folder")
Bash(cmd /c "cd /d d:\\deliverzler && flutter pub deps | findstr google_maps")
Bash(cmd /c "cd /d d:\\deliverzler && flutter pub add google_maps_flutter_web")
Bash(cmd /c "cd /d d:\\deliverzler && dart run build_runner build --delete-conflicting-outputs")
Bash(cmd /c "cd /d d:\\deliverzler && dart run build_runner build --delete-conflicting-outputs 2>&1")
